-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Storable instance for Complex
--   
--   Provides a Storable instance for Complex which is binary compatible
--   with C99, C++ and Fortran complex data types.
--   
--   The only purpose of this package is to provide a standard location for
--   this instance so that other packages needing this instance can play
--   nicely together.
@package storable-complex
@version 0.2.2


-- | This module provides a Storable instance for Complex which is binary
--   compatible with C99, C++ and Fortran complex data types. It's only
--   purpose is to provide a standard location for this instance so that
--   other packages needing this instance can play nicely together.
module Foreign.Storable.Complex
instance Storable a => Storable (Complex a)
